find_sitter.title: Find a suitable sitter
find_sitter.desc: Browse profiles, compare experience, reviews and availability to choose the right match for your pet.

make_request.title: Make a request
make_request.desc: Send a booking request, discuss details in chat, and confirm time, place and payment.

meet_updates.title: Meet and get updates
meet_updates.desc: Arrange a meet-and-greet, hand over instructions, and receive regular photo and text updates during the care.

about.welcome: Welcome to Barsik — a neighbourhood pet-sitting service that looks after your pets with care, consistency and kindness. Whether you need daily visits, overnight stays, or long-term care, our team treats every animal as if they were our own.

what.title: What we do
what.item1: Pet sitting — tailored visits to check, feed and play with your pet.
what.item2: Pet boarding — safe overnight care in a home environment.
what.item3: Dog walking — regular walks and exercise for dogs of all ages.
what.item4: Pet taxi — secure transportation to vet or groomer.
what.item5: Pet grooming — basic grooming and freshening for healthy coats.
